replies.body: In addition to Kokua's info, the[ syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) pinned on the boards here can help as well!
Posting here for the first time syncs up your in game level with your forum level. You should be able to post where you wanted to now!
